/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, indicating a busy day in the city. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue sky contrasting beautifully with the green trees and the various colors of the buildings. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the city's blend of nature and architecture.
